I went through the first few of your levels of tevfifty and they are 
great.  [Note, I am going through with a level 255 archmage with
other 
stats way up there on slaughter.  I will send my slightly 
illegitimate team through next, and lastly start to send a 100% 
legitimate team through every scenario.]  A couple of problems I 
noticed, though.

One early scenario ended as soon as I defeated the last villain and I 
did not get a chance to clean up on the gold and silver.

The forest was a little tight for my archmage to walk through (I had 
to summon an image of an elf to help me out), but that was probably 
the point.

Man, I love the extra large space to walk around for each scenario.  
If my archmage could not run so fast, it would make the some
scenarios 
with generators interesting.

I can not wait to go through more of the scenarios.
